coverageType.name: Coverage Type
coverageType.description: The type of parameter being covered by the SLA. ie. temperature, precipitation, cloudcover, flightdelay, luggagedelay, etc.

tripStartDate.name: Trip Start Date
tripStartDate.description: The start date of the trip that is being covered by the SLA, as a Unix timestamp, to allow personalized SLAs that do not align exactly with Period Dates from the PeriodRegistry.

tripEndDate.name: Trip End Date
tripEndDate.description: The end date of the trip that is being covered by the SLA, as a Unix timestamp, to allow personalized SLAs that do not align exactly with Period Dates from the PeriodRegistry.

location.name: Location
location.description: The human-readable location for the weather monitoring

coordinates.name: Coordinates
coordinates.description: The latitude and longitude coordinates for the selected location weather monitoring

maxDeviation.name: Maximum Deviation
maxDeviation.description: The maximum deviation from historical normal temperature and precipitation for the selected location
